mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_board where board_category = 1 and board_status = 'Y'

select board_no , board_title , m.mem_name as "b_writer" , m.dept_code , to_char(board_en_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "board_en_date" , board_count , board_top from tb_board b join tb_member m on(b.board_writer = m.mem_no) where board_category = 1 and board_status = 'Y' and board_top = 'Y'

select board_no , board_title , m.mem_name as "b_writer" , m.dept_code , to_char(board_en_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "board_en_date" , board_count , board_top from tb_board b join tb_member m on(b.board_writer = m.mem_no) where board_category = 1 and board_status = 'Y' order by 1 desc
mapper.update: update tb_board set board_count = board_count+1 where board_no = #{board_no} and board_status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select board_no , board_title , board_content , board_writer , m.mem_name as "b_writer" , board_count , to_char(board_en_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as "board_en_date" , j.job_name from tb_board b join tb_member m on(b.board_writer = m.mem_no) join tb_job j using(job_code) where board_no = #{boardNo} and board_category = 1 and board_status = 'Y'
select at_no , at_ref_bno , at_origin_name , at_change_name , at_upload_date from tb_attachment where at_ref_bno = #{boardNo} and at_category = 3 and at_status = 'Y'

select reply_no , re_board_no , reply_depth , reply_parent , reply_content , reply_writer , reply_job , to_char(reply_date, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "reply_date" , reply_status from tb_reply where reply_type = 4 and re_board_no = #{boardNo} start with reply_parent = 0 connect by prior reply_no = reply_parent order siblings by reply_no asc, reply_parent asc

select reply_no , re_board_no , reply_depth , reply_parent , reply_content , reply_writer , reply_job , to_char(reply_date, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "reply_date" , reply_status from tb_reply where reply_no = #{replyNo} start with reply_parent = 0 connect by prior reply_no = reply_parent order siblings by reply_no asc, reply_parent asc
mapper.update: update tb_reply set reply_content = #{replyContent}, reply_mo_date = sysdate where reply_no = #{replyNo} and reply_status = 'Y'
update tb_reply set reply_status = 'N' where reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_board ( board_no , board_title , board_content , board_writer , board_category , board_en_date ) values ( seq_bono.nextval , #{boardTitle} , #{boardContent} , #{boardWriter} , 1 , sysdate )
insert into tb_attachment ( at_no , at_ref_bno , at_category , at_origin_name , at_change_name ) values ( seq_atno.nextval , seq_bono.currval , 3 , #{atOriginName} , #{atChangeName} )
mapper.select: select board_no , board_title , board_content , m.mem_name as "b_writer" , m.dept_code , to_char(board_en_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "board_en_date" , board_count , board_top from tb_board b join tb_member m on(b.board_writer = m.mem_no) where board_category = 1 and board_status = 'Y' and (board_content like '%' || #{key} || '%' or board_title like '%' || #{key} || '%')
